site_name: JVC Business Park & JVC House, Priestley Way and 717, 719 & 721 North Circular Road, Neasden, London, NW2
description: Non-material amendment:South external emergency vehicle gate to site changed to suit tracking.Parking arrangement changed to north of generator building to suite load bank testing.Ground floor North Elevation - Roller shutter added and single door changed to a double door to suit ventilation strategy. As a result fuel inlet/dry riser location adjusted slightly.Ground Floor South Elevation - Roller shutters added to suit ventilation strategy. As a result fuel inlet/dry riser location adjusted slightly.North elevation, extract/intake louvres adjusted to suit internal ventilation requirements.External bin store with green roof added.West Elevation levels 1-4 mass reduced and changed from louvres to cladding panels.North core footprint and height reduced to just above mezzanine level, false core overruns to keep cladding going up to meet top of louvres. Louvres removed to expose cladding overrun behind.Middle core footprint and height reduced to just above mezzanine level.South core height reduced to just above mezzanine level, false core overrun to keep cladding going up to meet top of louvres.South west core reduced in height.North west core removed.Double door to east elevation of omitted.of Full Planning Permission reference 22/4185 dated 1 March, 2024, for Full planning application for the proposed development to extend the existing data centre on land to the north of the North Circular Road, incorporating 717 to 721 North Circular Road, including additional land to the rear, subject to Deed of Agreement dated 29th February 2024 under Section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990, as amended.
